net.edzard.kinetic

Class Text

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      • net.edzard.kinetic.Node
        • net.edzard.kinetic.Shape
          • net.edzard.kinetic.Text

  • public class Text
extends Shape
    A text shape. Used for writing text. Text formatting options are limited. There does not seem to be a wrap-around option for text boxes.
    Author:
    Ed

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      Font style for a text.

      Horizontal alignment options for text.
